Mega Miner Online is a multiplayer mining game with procedurally generated worlds, featuring mobile controls, admin systems, and persistent player progress. The game includes a save system using IndexedDB, real-time synchronization through MQTT, and a comprehensive shop system with upgrades and items. Players can mine resources, build structures, and interact with others in a shared underground environment.
